Package it.polimi.ingsw.networking

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.networking.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerInterface, WaitingRoomObserver, Loggable, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote
    public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements Loggable, WaitingRoomObserver, ServerInterface, java.io.Serializable
    Main class of the game server. It will set up the networking and create controllers and games. It is designed to support multiple games and players in a waiting room before starting a game, plus it manages loss of connections and users re-connections.
    Author:
    Daniele Chiappalupi, Stefano Formicola, Elena Iannucci
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Entry point of the server application
        Parameters:
        args - arguments passed as: [--run-saved-state] to restore a previously saved application state (WARNING! This will override other CLI arguments) [--socket=] [--rmi=] [--waiting-room-timeout=] [--operation-timeout=] [--debug] for debug purposes: sets waiting-room-timeout and operation-timeout to 10s

      • startNewGame

        Specified by:
        startNewGame in interface WaitingRoomObserver
        Parameters:
